character_schedule.morning: Dined with the defense architect. Boring man, but his neural map access was useful. Told him I liked quiet men. He blushed.
character_schedule.afternoon: Sabotaged a diplomatic summit between border colonies. Just enough to trigger suspicion, not war.
character_schedule.evening: Let rumors spread that I'm an agent of the Mirror Faith. Fear is delicious in crowds.

user_schedule.morning: Yoga with mom on terrace, rising sun.
user_schedule.evening: Bollywood dance tutorial on YouTube, laughs at missteps.

relationship: After spending some time together, they gradually get to know each other's personalities, interests, and habits. Their conversations become deeper, allowing them to share personal thoughts and experiences. Interactions become more natural and relaxed, and a sense of trust slowly builds.
